data.name: SqlCountIncompletePartitions
SqlCreateSchema
SqlReportProgress
data.value: UPDATE "partitions" SET "updated" = $updated, "position" = $position, "processed" = ("processed" + $progress), "remaining" = ("remaining" - $progress), "is_completed" = $completed WHERE ("id" = $id) AND ("owner" = $owner) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "is_split_requested" AS "is_split_requested";

data.name: SqlRetrieveJobById
data.value: SELECT "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error" FROM "jobs" WHERE "id" = $id;

data.name: SqlRetrievePartitionById
data.value: SELECT "id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "is_split_requested" AS "is_split_requested" FROM "partitions" WHERE ("id" = $id);

data.name: SqlTryAcquirePartition
data.value: UPDATE "partitions" SET "updated" = $updated, "owner" = $owner WHERE ("job_id" = $job_id) AND (("owner" IS NULL) OR ("updated" < $active)) AND ("is_completed" = 0) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "job_id" AS "job_id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "owner" AS "owner", "first" AS "first", "last" AS "last", "is_inclusive" AS "is_inclusive", "position" AS "position", "processed" AS "processed", "remaining" AS "remaining", "is_completed" AS "is_completed", "is_split_requested" AS "is_split_requested" ORDER BY "remaining" DESC LIMIT 1;

data.name: SqlTryRequestSplit
data.value: UPDATE "partitions" SET "is_split_requested" = 1 WHERE ("job_id" = $job_id) AND ("owner" IS NOT NULL) AND ("updated" >= $active) AND ("is_completed" = 0) AND ("is_split_requested" = 0) ORDER BY "remaining" DESC LIMIT 1;

data.name: SqlUpdateJobById
data.value: UPDATE "jobs" SET "updated" = $updated, "state" = $state, "error" = $error WHERE ("id" = $id) RETURNING "id" AS "id", "created" AS "created", "updated" AS "updated", "state" AS "state", "error" AS "error";
